Context: The George Brown College offers Early Childhood education training with a focus on hands-on experience. Students have the opportunity to work in real-world child care centers through offsite field experiences provided by industry partners and onsite opportunities at twelve George Brown managed child care centers or "lab schools." There are over 100 community agencies for additional field placements. The early childhood education training from George Brown College provides an advantage in various careers related to educating children. For more information, visit the website, sign up for updates, contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca or call 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559). The college has land acknowledgment information available. Note that the information in the website is subject to change without notice.
